description: A high explosive cartridge with a tapered nose and fins at the base.  It is designed to be fired from a mortar and used at long range against troops or light vehicles.
//: 190 g of comp-b, so explosion power should be 250; let's pretend case mass is third of the rest of the weight, so 500 g

description: A high explosive cartridge with a tapered nose and fins at the base.  It is designed to be fired from a mortar and used at long range against troops or light vehicles.  The M768 is a modern update to the older, less effective M720A1.
//: 358 g of pax-21, which is replacement for comp b - weaker (~1.0 tnt equivalent), but safer, so explosion power should be 358; let's pretend case mass is third of the rest of the weight, so 430 g
